shorts.title: 24th commemoration of 9/11 set
shorts.description: The 9/11 Memorial Committee of Lackawanna County will hold the 24th commemoration of the terrorist attacks on America of Sept. 11, 2001, with a ceremony Thursday, Sept. 11, at 8 a.m. at the memorial site in McDade Park. The Firefighters Bell Ceremony will be a featured moment in this solemn remembrance of the people who died that day, which included two Lackawanna County natives: Laura Lee DeFazio Morabito, a Clarks Summit native, and Jerry Moran, a Scranton native. First responder Dan Shaufler succumbed to the toxic residue of Ground Zero. From left: Bob Rutkowski, PA Ambulance emergency medical technician; Victoria […]

shorts.title: 13th annual Capt. Minicozzi Memorial Race during La Festa Italiana
shorts.description: The 13th annual Capt. James R. Minicozzi Memorial Race, through the UNICO Scranton Chapter, will take place Saturday, Aug. 30, at 10 a.m. in downtown Scranton during La Festa Italiana. You can preregister ($25) at runsignup.com/Minicozzi until Monday. All preregistered participants will receive a voucher for a free yoga class at Yoga West. Registration on race day ($35) is at Linden Street and North Washington Avenue from 8-9:30 a.m. Proceeds benefit the children at the Boys & Girls Clubs of NEPA for their annual Christmas party and college scholarships at Minicozzi’s alma mater, West Scranton High School. From left: Chris […]

shorts.title: HS FOOTBALL ROUNDUP: Naniewicz, Spataro spark Lakeland past Carbondale Area
shorts.title_distilled: HS FOOTBALL ROUNDUP: Naniewicz, Spataro spark Lakeland past Carbondale Area.
shorts.description: David Naniewicz threw for 137 yards and two touchdowns, and ran for 55 to lead Lakeland to a 52-14 win over Carbondale Area in a nonleague high school football game on Friday night at the Andrew J. Cerra Sports Complex. Sophomore Rocco Spataro ran for a touchdown and returned a kickoff 80 yards for a touchdown for the Chiefs. Lakeland jumped out to a 33-7 lead in the first half. Jackson Pochas scored on a 22-yard run and Spataro scored on a 4-yard burst to give the Chiefs a 14-0 advantage after the first quarter. Gavin Roberts had a 5-yard […]
shorts.content: David Naniewicz threw for 137 yards and two touchdowns, and ran for 55 to lead Lakeland to a 52-14 win over Carbondale Area in a nonleague high school football game on Friday night at the Andrew J. shorts.title: Old Forge mailman retires after 44 years, leaving his stamp on the community
shorts.title_distilled: Old Forge mailman retires after 44 years, leaving his stamp on the community.
shorts.description: After more than four decades of delivering mail, one mailman in Lackawanna County is hanging up his bag and leaving his stamp on the community.
shorts.content: After more than four decades of delivering mail, one mailman in Lackawanna County is hanging up his bag and leaving his stamp on the community.
